COOPER
v.
BERGER, et al. 315PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 5, 2018 Jim W. Phillips, Jr., Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Eric M. David, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Daniel F.E. Smith, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Cooper, Roy A. (III). Noah H. Huffstetler, III, Attorney at Law, D. Martin Warf, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Berger, Philip E., et al. Andrew H. Erteschik, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Professor Marin K. Levy.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of November 2018 by Professor Marin K. Levy for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2018."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
